alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Lancaster; Middlesex; Richmond (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Middlesex, west central Northumberland, southeastern Richmond, southeastern Essex and northwestern Lancaster Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dunnsville, or near Warsaw, moving east southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Robley, Center Cross, Dunnsville, Morattico, Sharps, Farnham, Jamaica, Upright, Nuttsville, Belle Isle State Park, Tidewater, Kennard, Dodlyt, Samos, Laneview, Lara, Nesting, Wellford and Somers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
